Locate Object
Ascertainment | Divination
  • Duration: Concentration
    Range: Touch
    AOE: Self

  • You imagine an item in your mind with any level of specificity, whether it be a generic blade or a ruby-encrusted boot youâ€™ve seen in the past. For the duration of the spell, you are aware of the direct direction to find the nearest item that fits the description given, completely ignoring obstacles.
